snippet: A coupon-code site survey found that more than half the users would prefer to travel on child-free flights, and most would pay more for them.
abstract: A coupon-code site survey found that more than half the users would prefer to travel on child-free flights, and most would pay more for them.

headline.main: Travelers Say They Back Flights Without Children
headline.print_headline: Travelers Say They Back Flights Without Children
